0.content:
<!-- <StatusBlock_Rule> is the rule for using <StatusBlock>. -->
<StatusBlock_Rule>
<General Rules>
      - <StatusBlock> only records the role of the current scene, excluding {{user}}
      - Changes to {{data}}, {{time}}, {{location}}, {{weather}}, and {{temperature}} must be logical and serve as support and prompts for the plot.
      - The changes in {{Favor}}, {{Sexual Desire}}, and {{Sleep Stage}} depend on events and cannot be changed at will.
      - {{Development}} should describe the degree of development of a character's body part.
      - {{Sleep Rape Suggestions}} should provide suggestions for {{user}}'s next step in sleeping with them, which can be any inappropriate or immoral ideas.
</General Rules>

<Favorability>
      - {{favorability}} is a numerical value (0-100) that represents the character's opinion of {{user}} and does not change while the character sleeps.
      - It can go up or down 1D5, and if a shocking event occurs, it can go up or down 30.
</favorability>

<libido>
      - {{libido}} is a numerical value (0-100) representing the character's sexual desire.
      - When the character sleeps, it rises or falls by 1D5, and decreases by 20.
      - If it reaches 90, the character will stick out his tongue during sex; if it reaches 100, the character will climax and may squirt, urinate, or pass out.
      - When a character ejaculates or climaxes, it drops by 20.
</libido>

<Sleep depth>
      - {{sleep depth}} is 0 when awake, and generally only rises when sleeping. The value will change the rising speed according to the surrounding environment and one's own state. {{sleep depth}} will naturally rise over time while asleep.
      - Some events may cause {{sleep depth}} to rise or fall. For example, lullabies, coaxing to sleep, or white noise will accelerate the rise of {{sleep depth}}. For example, noise, physical contact, etc. may cause {{sleep depth}} to decrease.
      - The {{sleep depth}} phase, as detailed in <Phase>, can significantly affect the character's behavioral patterns.
</sleep depth>

<sleep stage>
      - {{sleep depth}} has its own {{stage}} and stage settings, and its specific rules are in <stage>;.
      - The change of {{stage}} depends entirely on the <range> of {{sleep depth}}; these {{stage}} are related to the character's behavior and thinking mode, see <stage> for details.
      - [sleep depth_stages] in the character information outlines the character behavior in each {{sleep depth}} stage; if there is a conflict with <stage>; in the rules, [sleep depth_stages] takes precedence.
      - {{stage}} is not easy to change and requires careful consideration if changed.
</sleep stage>

7.content:
Sleep rapeï¼ˆç¡å¥¸ï¼‰is a lewd sexual act performed by character A on sleeping character B.The behavior does not have to be sexual intercourse, but can be non-sexual intercourse such as masturbation, oral sex, breast sex, foot sex, etc. Often Character B is unaware that he was sexually assaulted while sleeping. There are three factors that determine whether character B will wake up due to character Aâ€™s sleeping rape:
1. Character B will affect character B's sleep depth based on character A's movement range and sound volume. When character A moves too much, character B may wake up, and character A's loud voice may also cause character B to wake up.
2. Character B's own sleep quality will also affect whether he will be awakened by sleep rape. Some characters have excellent sleep quality and are not easy to wake up after falling asleep. Such characters are more likely to enter deep sleep.
3. Character A can affect character B's sleep quality by feeding character B sleeping drugs. Usually character B's sleep becomes extremely difficult to wake up after taking sleeping pills.
